name: djinni-parser-bot
description: Telegram bot for parsing Djinni RSS feeds and sending jobs to chats

scripts.docker:up: mkdir -p data && (docker rm -f djinni-parser-bot >/dev/null 2>&1 || true) && docker run -d --name djinni-parser-bot --restart unless-stopped --env-file .env -e DATABASE_PATH=/app/data/data.sqlite -v "$(pwd)/data:/app/data" djinni-parser-bot:local
scripts.docker:run: mkdir -p data && docker run --rm --name djinni-parser-bot --env-file .env -e DATABASE_PATH=/app/data/data.sqlite -v "$(pwd)/data:/app/data" djinni-parser-bot:local
scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
